name: Wild Hat
description:
It was a wonderful party, everything was going smoothly. A magician was trying a magic trick, removing balloons from a hat when suddenly things went out of hand and the magician could not control the out put of his hat and balloons started flying everywhere. There is a power line above the roof and if the balloons make contact with it, it could start a fire so the decision was to pop them.
Your mission is to join the magician to pop the balloons to prevent a fire and course power failure.

Please support Liki Studios

Thanks for Playing...
